verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:10
verses.text: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:11
verses.text: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:12
verses.text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:13
verses.text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:14
verses.text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:

verses.name: 2 Timothy 4:15
verses.text: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.
